mapper.select: select no, subject, member_no,view,date_format(write_date,'%y-%m-%d %H:%i') write_date from board where category='free' order by no desc
select no, subject, member_no,view,date_format(write_date,'%y-%m-%d %H:%i') write_date from board where category='help' order by no desc
select b.no,b.member_no, m.nickname, m.no, b.subject, b.category, b.view, b.content from board b join member m on b.member_no=m.no where b.no=${no} order by b.member_no desc
mapper.delete: delete from board where no=#{param1} and member_no=#{param2}
mapper.update: update board set view=view+1 where no=#{param1}
mapper.select: select no, category, subject, content from board where no=#{param1}
mapper.update: update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where no=${no} and member_no=#{member_no}
